column2: make analytic data and code available so that others may reproduce findings

column1: which parts of the analysis should be made available in order to ensure reproducibility?
column2:
- data & metadata
 - computer code (including all steps from measured data > analytic data > computed data)
 - documentation if code and data
 - standard means of distribution
Literate programming combines human-readable (documentation) and machine-readable text (code)

column1: Which R package allows to do literatr programming?
